targets.query: SELECT (last("num-goroutines")) AS "last_num-goroutines" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."metrics" WHERE time > now() - 5s
SELECT last("memory-alloc") AS "last_memory-alloc" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."metrics" WHERE time > now() - 5m
SELECT mean("request-time") AS "mean_request-time" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(20s)

SELECT count("BancoDoBrasil-status") + count("BradescoNetEmpresa-status") + count("Caixa-status") + count("Citibank-status") + count("Itau-status") + count("Santander-status") FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos"
SELECT mean("bradesco-netempresa-register-boleto-online") AS "mean_bradesco-netempresa-register-boleto-online" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("itau-get-ticket-boleto-time") AS "mean_itau-get-ticket-boleto-time" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("itau-register-boleto-time") AS "mean_itau-register-boleto-time" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("bb-login-time") AS "mean_bb-login-time" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("bb-register-boleto-time") AS "mean_bb-register-boleto-time" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("santander-get-ticket-boleto-time") AS "mean_bb-register-boleto-time" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("santander-register-boleto-time") AS "mean_bb-register-boleto-time" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("citibank-register-boleto-online") AS "mean_citibank-register-boleto-online" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("caixa-register-time") AS "mean_caixa-register-time" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("bradesco-shopfacil-register-boleto-online") AS "mean_citibank-register-boleto-online" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT count("BradescoNetEmpresa-status") AS "registred Itau" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "BradescoNetEmpresa-status"=200
SELECT count("Itau-status") AS "registred Itau" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "Itau-status"=200
SELECT count("BancoDoBrasil-status") AS "registred Banco do Brasil " FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "BancoDoBrasil-status"=200
SELECT count("Santander-status") AS "registred Santader" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "Santander-status"=200
SELECT count("Citibank-status") AS "registred Citibank" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "Citibank-status"=200
SELECT count("Caixa-status") AS "registred Caixa" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 1h AND "Caixa-status"=200
SELECT count("BradescoShopFacil-status") AS "registred ShopFacil" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "BradescoShopFacil-status"=200
SELECT count("BradescoNetEmpresa-status") AS "registred BradescoNetEmpresa" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "BradescoNetEmpresa-status"<>200
SELECT count("Itau-status") AS "registred Santander" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "Itau-status"<>200
SELECT count("BancoDoBrasil-status") AS "bad-request Banco do Brasil " FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "BancoDoBrasil-status"<>200
SELECT count("Santander-status") AS "registred Santander" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "Santander-status"<>200
SELECT count("Citibank-status") AS "registred Citibank" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "Citibank-status"<>200
SELECT count("Caixa-status") AS "registred Caixa" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "Caixa-status"=400
SELECT count("BradescoShopFacil-status") AS "registred Bradesco" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 2h AND "BradescoShopFacil-status"<>200
SELECT count("BradescoNetEmpresa-status") AS "errors" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "BradescoNetEmpresa-status"<>200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("BradescoNetEmpresa-status") AS "success" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "BradescoNetEmpresa-status"=200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("Citibank-status") AS "errors" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "Citibank-status"<>200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("Citibank-status") AS "success" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "Citibank-status"=200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("BradescoShopFacil-status") AS "errors" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "BradescoShopFacil-status"<>200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("BradescoShopFacil-status") AS "success" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "BradescoShopFacil-status"=200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("Santander-status") AS "errors" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "Santander-status"<>200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("Santander-status") AS "success" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "Santander-status"=200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("Itau-status") AS "errors" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "Itau-status"<>200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("Itau-status") AS "success" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "Itau-status"=200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("BancoDoBrasil-status") AS "errors" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "BancoDoBrasil-status"<>200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("BancoDoBrasil-status") AS "success" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "BancoDoBrasil-status"=200 Group by time(1h)

panels.title: Banco do Brasil Errors x Success

targets.query: SELECT count("BradescoShopFacil-status") AS "errors" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "Caixa-status"<>200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT count("BancoDoBrasil-status") AS "success" FROM "boleto-api"."business"."boletos" WHERE time > now() - 24h AND "Caixa-status"=200 Group by time(1h)
SELECT mean("request-time") AS "mean_request-time" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."timing" WHERE time > now() - 1h GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("memory-alloc") AS "mean_memory-alloc" FROM "boleto-api"."runtime"."metrics" WHERE time > now() - 1h GROUP BY time(3m)
